text: NGC 2242 is a planetary nebula in the constellation Auriga. It was discovered by Lewis A. Swift on November 24, 1886, and was thought to be a galaxy until a study published in 1987 showed it to be a planetary nebula. The nebula is located about 6,500 light-years away, and about 1,600 light-years above the galactic plane. == References == == External links == * * NED – NGC 2242 * SEDS – NGC 2242 * VizieR – NGC 2242 Category:Planetary nebulae Category:Auriga (constellation) 2242
title: NGC 2242
